General.follow_guide: Please follow our guide and try to be as descriptive and helpful as possible.
General.fail_suggest: There was an error with the data provided. Please try again or send us feedback.
General.no_delete: No, I want to keep it.
General.login_first: You need to log in first.

Company.start_with: Start with the company you want to review.
Company.if_not_find: If you don't find its name
Company.upload_error: Image upload failed. Please try with different image or send us feedback.
Company.create_verify: The company form will be verified by an administrator and updated as soon as possible. Thank you for your contribution.
Company.enter_name: Enter the company name you want to find...
Company.name: Name
Company.name_placeholder: Required. Max 150 characters. The company name.
Company.address_placeholder: Required. Max 200 characters. The company address.
Company.logo_placeholder: Required. Max filesize 500KB. The company logo.
Company.website_placeholder: Optional. Max 150 characters. The company website.

Comment.delete_ask: Are you sure you want to delete your comment?
Comment.content_placeholder: Required. Max 5000 characters. Your comment on the review.
Comment.title: Comments
Comment.review_first: Please select a review to create a comment.

Feedback.share_reason: Your feedback is a crucial factor in helping the website develop and serve users better. Please be as specific and detailed as possible. Rest assured that your opinions are always listened to and responded to promptly.
Feedback.name: Name
Feedback.email_placeholder: Optional. Only needed if you require a response from us.
Feedback.content_placeholder: Required. Max 5000 characters. Your feedback on any areas that need to be added or improved on the website.

Review.company_intro: You can find reviews of the company here. Feel free to review, comment, and react as well.
Review.user_intro: You can find reviews of user here. Feel free to review, comment, and react as well.
Review.title: Title
Review.delete_ask: Are you sure you want to delete your review?
Review.branch_plaeceholder: Optional. Max 100 characters. A large company can have many branches. Specify the geographical location or the name of the branch where you work.
Review.duration_placeholder: Optional. Specify how many months you have worked at the company. Must be at least one month.
Review.title_placeholder: Optional. Max 100 characters. List all the titles you have held while working at the company.
Review.facilities_placeholder: Optional. Max 500 characters. Provide a brief description of the company's infrastructure or office working conditions, focusing on factors that support or hinder your work.
Review.team_placeholder: Optional. Max 500 characters. Provide a brief description of your work team. Include the number, quality, and teamwork capabilities. Focus on general experiences—positive or negative—working with them, without going into specific individuals.
Review.process_placeholder: Optional. Max 500 characters. Provide a brief description of the company's workflow and how it has either supported or hindered your job functions.
Review.benefits_placeholder: Optional. Max 500 characters. Provide a brief description of the benefits you receive while working at the company. Have they met your expectations? Are there any benefits you feel are lacking?
Review.rate_placeholder: Required. Select a rating for your company
Review.company_first: Please select a company to create a review.

Report.other_type_placeholder: Optional. Max 100 characters. You can clarify other types of reports here.

Hero.title: Trusted Reviews, Valuable Insights
Hero.description: Fed up with subjective company reviews and unhelpful negative rants? Discover our website, where you’ll find objective, valuable insights to help you choose the perfect company with confidence.

WhyChoose.title: Why Choose TrustCompany
WhyChoose.description: We simply want to create a space where everyone can freely share their reviews about companies, allowing users to rely on these insights to make accurate decisions.
WhyChoose.benefit_1: No venting frustrations or attacking individuals or organizations.
WhyChoose.benefit_2: Reviews are created with users' benefits in mind.
WhyChoose.benefit_3: Comprehensive, in-depth reviews while maintaining flexible formats.

Guide.no_login: You don't have to log in to access the feature.
Guide.must_login: You have to log in to access the feature.
Guide.description: This is a complete guide to the features you can use on the website. If there is any incorrect or missing information, please send us your feedback.
Guide.login_1: You don't have to log in if you just want to find or create a company and read reviews about it.
Guide.login_2: To log in, click the Login button in the navigation bar and fill in your email and password.
Guide.logout_1: To log out, click the Logout button in the navigation bar.
Guide.language_1: You can change the language to your preference by clicking the Language button in the navigation bar. Currently, the two supported languages are English and Vietnamese.
Guide.find_company_1: Go to the "Find Your Company" section on the homepage.
Guide.find_company_2: Enter your company name in the input field.
Guide.find_company_3: Alternatively, if you are on any page other than the homepage, you can use the input field in the navigation menu at the top of the website.
Guide.create_company_1: If you don't find the company, feel free to create one through the 'here' button in the same section as above.
Guide.create_company_2: You can only perform this action on the homepage.
Guide.create_company_3: After submitting the form, we will verify it quickly and add the company to the list.
Guide.help_enrich: Please help us enrich the company list.
Guide.help_enrich_1: Your contributions are a powerful motivation for others to create genuine and useful reviews.
Guide.find_review_company_1: Click on the company item from the dropdown list that appears when you type the company name.
Guide.find_review_company_2: You will be redirected to the reviews list of that company.
Guide.find_review_company_3: On your right, there is a sort button. You can sort by time (newest, oldest) or by rating (excellent, good, normal, bad, terrible).
Guide.find_review_company_4: At the bottom, you can navigate between pages of results.
Guide.find_review_you_1: After that, click the My Reviews button in the top navigation bar.
Guide.review_actions_1: To create a review, click the button at the top of the review list.
Guide.review_actions_2: For other actions, at the top of each review, click the '...' button.
Guide.review_actions_3: You can edit or delete the review if you made it, and report review made by others.
Guide.review_actions_4: Fill out the forms if needed.
Guide.review_components_1: From left to right, top to bottom
Guide.review_components_2: The name of the user who made the review.
Guide.review_components_3: Their rating (excellent, good, normal, bad, terrible)
Guide.review_components_5: Review actions: update or delete if made by you, and report if made by others.
Guide.review_components_7: Branch: geographic location or branch name of the company.
Guide.review_components_9: Title: all the titles the user held while working at that company.
Guide.review_components_10: Facilities: the infrastructure or working office conditions of the company.
Guide.review_components_11: Team: the quantity, quality, and teamwork ability of the company's staff.
Guide.review_components_12: Process: description of the company's work process, including advantages and challenges.
Guide.review_components_13: Benefits: description of the welfare benefits at the company.
Guide.review_components_14: Detailed review: detailed evaluation of other aspects of the company not mentioned above.
Guide.review_components_15: Comment count and link to comment section.
Guide.find_comment_review_1: Click on the comment count section at the bottom of a review.
Guide.find_comment_review_2: You will be redirected to the comments list of that review.
Guide.find_comment_review_3: On your right, there is a 'Back to reviews' button, which will redirect you back to the list of reviews.
Guide.find_comment_you_1: After that, click the My Comments button in the top navigation bar.
Guide.comment_actions_1: To create a comment, click the button at the top of the comment list.
Guide.comment_actions_2: For other actions, at the top of each comment, click the '...' button.
Guide.comment_actions_3: You can edit or delete the comment if you made it, and report comment made by others.
Guide.comment_actions_4: Fill out the forms if needed.
Guide.reaction_actions_1: You can view reactions by checking the emoji list at the top of each review or comment.
Guide.reaction_actions_2: Reactions made by you will be highlighted in blue, while reactions made by others will be in black.
Guide.reaction_actions_3: To make a reaction, click the smile icon to show the full list of emojis and select the one you want.
Guide.reaction_actions_4: You can delete a reaction by clicking the emoji again.
Guide.report_actions_1: You can report another person's comment or review by clicking the '...' button at the top of the comment or review.
Guide.report_actions_2: If the report is justified, we will delete the content within 1-2 days after being notified.
Guide.report_actions_3: We may delete your review or comment if we feel it violates our standards and negatively influences the decisions of other users.
Guide.report_actions_4: Please send us feedback if you feel that decision is unjustified.
Guide.feedback_actions_1: You can send us feedback by clicking the Feedback button in the navigation bar.
Guide.feedback_actions_2: Your feedback is always welcome to help make this a better website. Don't hesitate to tell us anything that needs improvement or is lacking.

CreateAccount.title: Create A New Account
CreateAccount.name: Name
CreateAccount.create_success: Account created successfully. Please check your email inbox to follow the instructions.
CreateAccount.verify_success: Email verification successful. Please log in to use the website.
CreateAccount.verify_fail: An error occurred. Please check the link or send us feedback.

ForgotPassword.request_success: You have successfully requested a new password. Please check your email inbox to follow the instructions.
ForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPassword.reset_success: You have successfully requested a new password.
